definitions.text: a component that is added to something to improve it
examples: the addition of a bathroom was a major improvement
the addition of cinnamon improved the flavor

definitions.text: the act of adding one thing to another
examples: the addition of flowers created a pleasing effect
the addition of a leap day every four years
there was an addition to property taxes this year
they recorded the cattle's gain in weight over a period of weeks

definitions.text: something added to what you already have
examples: the librarian shelved the new accessions
he was a new addition to the staff

definitions.text: a suburban area laid out in streets and lots for a future residential area
the arithmetic operation of summing; calculating the sum of two or more numbers
examples: the summation of four and three gives seven
